Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Alcudia, Viva Sunrise is convenient to Alcudia Port and San Jaume Church. This family-friendly aparthotel is within the vicinity of Albufera Natural Park and Pollensa Port.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 254 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Viva Sunrise, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this aparthotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Viva Sunrise, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alcudia Port - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
San Jaume Church - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Albufera Natural Park - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Pollensa Port - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Cala Barques - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Campanet Caves - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Ufanes Fonts - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi
Lluc Monastery - 19.6 km / 12.2 mi
Castillo de Alaro - 29.7 km / 18.5 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 31.4 km / 19.5 mi
Puig Mayor - 32.6 km / 20.2 mi
Can Prunera Museum of Modernism - 34.6 km / 21.5 mi
Ferrocarril de Soller Train Station - 35 km / 21.7 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 35.1 km / 21.8 mi

The preferred airport for Viva Sunrise is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 45.6 km / 28.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
